Class AbstractLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.amcgala.framework.lighting.AbstractLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Light
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbientLight, PointLight, SpotLight

    public abstract class AbstractLight
extends Object
implements Light
    Oberklasse aller Lichter im Framework.

    Robert Giacinto
